attributes.action: All of the UK should vote if there is a future Scottish independence referendum
attributes.additional_details: SNP believe it is their right and destiny to remove Scotland from the UK with no consideration to the rest of the Union. I believe as the implications effect all  people in the UK all people in UK have just as much right to vote on any future referendum if granted by Parliament.
attributes.background: SNP keeps pushing for independence referendum stating the Scottish people have a right to vote for independence . If such a request is considered by Parliament I propose the total UK should vote as the impact and implications affect the whole Union not just Scotland

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly whether you'd like Scotland only to become independent if a majority of the UK vote for it, and what would happen if the vote in Scotland was different to the rest of the UK.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to happen.
